title: Veg Sandwich With Mint Sauce || Breakfast || Kids
content:
Breakfast recipe: Veg Sandwich with mint sauce Servings : 2 Duration : 20 mins Easy and quick breakfast recipe for kids / everyone at home. When you want to have healthy breakfast make sandwiches with full of veggies and flavours. It's healthy & tasty too. Before starting the process of Veg Sandwich With Mint Sauce. First you have to pre-prepare mint sauce How to make mint sauce for sandwich? Ingredients: Mint leaves - 80 gms Dry coconut powder - 3 tb sp ( you can also use fresh grated coconut) Garlic cloves - 2 - peeled off Green chillies - 3 Salt - 1 tsp Lemon - half - juice Procedure:
  • In mixer grinder add garlic cloves, green chillies & salt.
  • Blend smooth
  • Add mint leaves & blend smooth
  • Add coconut powder & blend smooth by adding water ( do not add so much of water )
  • Take out in a bowl
  • Add lemon juice and mix well
  • Mint sauce is ready
[caption id="attachment_4101" align="alignnone" width="1020"] Mint sauce 😊[/caption] Nutrition facts: Mint: Vitamins: A & C Minerals : Iron Carrots: Vitamins : A, C & B6 Minerals : calcium, iron, magnesium & potassium Capsicum/ Bell pepper: Vitamins : A,C & B6 Minerals: Calcium, Iron & magnesium Cabbage : Vitamin : C Minerals: Potassium Onion: Vitamins: C & B6 Minterals: Iron, magnesium & potassium Ghee: Fat & protein Today, I prepared a sandwich which is loaded with carrot, capsicum/ Green bell pepper, Cabbage,onion & mint sauce. Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Preparation of Veg sandwich with mint sauce: Ingredients : Milk bread slices - 4 ( You can use any bread) Ghee / Butter - 1 tb sp Mint sauce - 3 tb sp Julienne cut Carrot - 1/2 Capsicum/ Bell pepper - 1/2 Onion - 1/2 Cabbage - 80 gms Tomato slices - seedless - 4 Pepper powder - fine - 1/2 tsp salt - 1/4 tsp Lemon juice - 1 tsp Procedure:
  • Toast bread slices with ghee/ butter
  • Add veggies in a bowl and add pepper powder , salt and lemon juice.
  • Mix well and keep aside for 5 mins
  • Apply 1/2 tb sp mint sauce on each slice
  • Put tomato slices
  • Spread veggies on both slices
  • Carefully, Flip slice on the other slice
  • Chop into half
  • Serve it with tomato sauce/ ketchup
  • Yummy breakfast for kids & everyone at home 🏡
  • Happy cooking 😊
